English
Epic story about two families and their friendship and common destiny in
Sweden's Gothenburg in the 1940s and 1950s. Told from the perspective of young
Simon Larsson, who learns that he's an adopted child who has a Jewish father
from Germany. After WWII Simon travels to explore his roots - a journey that
leads to the basic mysteries of the human life. After the bestselling novel by
Marianne Fredriksson.
